name: refine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something pure or improve something, especially by removing unwanted material: Crude oil is industrially refined to purify it and separate out the different elements, such as benzene.
C2 to improve an idea, method, system, etc. by making small changes: Engineers spent many months refining the software.

to make a substance pure by removing unwanted material: Sugar and oil are refined before use.
To refine something also means to improve it by making small changes: We haven’t finished refining the plan yet.

PRODUCTION to improve something or to make it pure, especially by removing material that is not wanted: Crude oil is industrially refined to purify it.
to improve an idea, a method, a system, etc. by making small changes: Engineers spent many months refining the software.
